positions.title: Investing Team Member
description: Completed a VC curriculum with 2 weekly meetings, analyzing valuation case studies, and engaging with NYC founders and investors
Created a final pitch on Senra Systems (a16z-backed) analyzing market, competition, and moats; connected with the CEO Jordan Black

positions.title: Insight Team Member
description: Gained hands-on experience in Python (Numpy & Pandas), SQL, and data visualization to develop processing & regression modeling skills
Conducted a semester-long team project on valuing NBA draft picks using decision trees, random forests, and XGBoost models

positions.title: Workshop Team Member
description: Selected as 1 of 12 students from 200+ applicants for a semester-long training program on financial markets and macroeconomic principles
Created a Tesla Short pitch with a DCF model and company & industry overview, and a Reserve Bank of Australia macroeconomic pitch

positions.title: Mentorship Program Mentee
description: Admitted as 1 of 10 freshmen to a 10-week cryptocurrency mentorship program with training in wallets, smart contracts, and DeFi protocols
Completed a Product Team capstone project for Base by Coinbase, by identifying their market and pain points to create 3 recommendations

positions.title: Workshop Member
description: Mentored by 3 upperclassmen to gain experience in accounting and finance, as well as financial statements, behavioral skills, and networking
Selected from 100+ applicants to attend 10 weekly meetings to develop important accounting skills through professional and social events
